name: Social Media Platform — Dalhousie University
author: Shruti Jakhar
points: Designed and developed a full-stack platform for student interaction.
Implemented user authentication, role-based access control, and dynamic course management using Spring Boot.
Built a responsive front-end in ReactJS integrated via REST APIs.
Used MySQL database with schema design based on normalization and indexing.

name: SmartLibrary Manager — Java & SQL
author: Shruti Jakhar
points: Developed a console-based application to manage library operations.
Added features for book management, issue/return logs, and user tracking.
Implemented full CRUD operations with SQL joins and stored procedures.
Ensured data integrity using validations and optimized queries.

name: Personal Portfolio Website
author: Shruti Jakhar
description: Developed a responsive personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information.

name: Battleship Game — Java
author: Shruti Jakhar
description: Created a two-player Battleship game using object-oriented programming principles, including inheritance and polymorphism.

name: Restaurant Web Application
author: Shruti Jakhar
points: Built a responsive restaurant website with online ordering and payment functionality.
Implemented dynamic menus, cart functionality, and customer feedback form.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance for mobile devices.
